record.id: field.name="processManager" and file.name="environment" and term=NULL and format.name="environment.cm3r.g" and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: processManager
record.file.name: environment
record.format.name: environment.cm3r.g

brief.brief: The Change Manager email address. When an operator logs in to the system, the global variable $G.chmmanagerEmail (which contains this value) is created.

detail.detail: When a change marked as Emergency with Category different from "Release Management", "Subscription", "CI Group", or "KM Document" is opened, updated or closed, a notification is sent to the Change Manager email address.
